snippet: Former President George Bush, 88, went home from Methodist Hospital in Houston on Monday.
abstract: Former Pres George H W Bush leaves Methodist Hospital in Houston after spending nearly two months being treated for bronchitis-related cough and other health issues.
lead_paragraph: Former President George Bush, 88, went home from Methodist Hospital in Houston on Monday.

headline.main: Texas: Ex-President George Bush Out of Hospital
headline.print_headline: Texas: Ex-President George Bush Out of Hospital
